name: Park Tool SPA-2 Pin Spanner
description: Bang for the buck, this spanner is durable, comfortable and won't break the bank when for a crank and freewheel removal or install.Made of high carbon tool steel.Vinyl coated handle offers a comfortble and secure grip.Fits 1-key release retaining rings on Shimano® and Campagnolo® cranksets and the adjusting cone on most freewheel clusters (not freehubs).Colour-coded for easy recognition.Pin diameter is 0.090in. (2.3mm).
